qr.title: QR Check-in Code
qr.subtitle: Scan to automatically check-in to meeting

instructions.title: Check-in Instructions
instructions.step1: Open phone Camera or QR scanner app.
instructions.step2: Scan the code to open Check-in page.
instructions.step3: If unable to scan, use link or enter code manually above.

qr.warning: This code is valid for 30 minutes before meeting time.
